name: Tiny Tanks (itch) (AnarchyGames)
description:
Long ago, a great war waged. A war between hamster kingdoms, armed to the teeth, hiring the best engineers their species had to offer. The tanks grew bigger and bigger, advancing from simple gun turrets to laser cannons, guided missile assaults and more...

DRIVING CONTROLS: 

WASD to rotate and move

Left-Click to fire towards mouse

Right-Click to use energy weapons

BUILDER CONTROLS:

Click on a piece, then click to place. Right-click to cancel placement, or click Restart to begin your design over again.
